name: Meteor Dodge (Andrew Spinks)
description:
Hey Mates!

This is the first game jam that I was apart of. It was done in school, over the period of 6 hours. There were 3 of us in the team.

I came up with the game concept, and coded everything except the player controller.

Elric coded the player controller, created the particle effects and did the level design.

Diana created the assets that were used in the game.

All in all I think it turned out pretty well for our first ever game jam. It's quite surprising just how much work you can get done in 6 hours when push comes to shove.

As always, C&C is welcoe, but it is extremely unlikely that I will ever return to this project.

Controls:

-WASD/arrow keys to move

-Space bar to deploy the umbrella

-Q to quit game

-R to play again.

Thanks for checking it out mates!

Andrew.
